newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Sembawang unit in Net security service.
newsitem.headline: Sembawang unit in Net security service.

text.p: Sembawang Media, a unit of diversified marine conglomerate Sembawang Corp, said on Tuesday it would launch an Internet security service.
The service will be the first Certification Authority (CA) operator in Singapore whereby it will certify the identity of users on the Internet, the company said.

Sembawang Media, which has a stake in one of Singapore's Internet Service Providers, Pacific Internet, will launch the service together with trials of electronic commerce on the Internet by the National Computer Board starting December 1.
In the trials, the company will register users who conduct transactions over the Internet to ensure security in online transactions.
